auth.provide_details: Please provide your details to continue
auth.add_code_sent_phone: Please add the code sent to your phone
auth.filling_your_details: Let’s get started filling your details
auth.enter_email_reset_password: Enter your email to send you a link to reset your password
auth.we_sent_you_an_email_to_set_up_your_new_: We sent you an email with a link for you to set up your new password.
auth.asked_for_a_verification_code: You will be asked for a verification code when you sign in the app
auth.you_will_receive_a_sms: You will receive a SMS code on your phone:
auth.a_new_sms_was_sent: A new SMS was sent to your phone
auth.please_confirm_code: Please confirm your account by entering the authorisation code sent to
auth.take_a_minute_to_receive_code: It might take a minute to receive a your code. haven’t received it?
auth.you_need_scan_this_qr: You need to scan this QR Code with your verification app to and enter the verification code below.
auth.your_account_has_been_verified: Your account has been verified. You can use the platform now.

settings.you_are_currently_logged_in_as: You are currently logged in as {{email}} Here you can manage settings related to your account. Keep in mind that certain actions require you to re-authenticate.
settings.enable_2fa_message: If you enable this, you will be able to set up a second factor using a TOTP Authenticator App. This is a one-time password that expires after a certain time. You must input this password before it expires to authenticate and perform the protected actions.
